config_description: enable or disable keepalive on rpc/native connections
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration code for rpc_keepalive is used to enable or disable keepalive on rpc/native connections. It is set in the Server constructor where it initializes the pipelineConfigurator with the DatabaseDescriptor.getRpcKeepAlive() value.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The triggering frequency of the rpc_keepalive configuration in the system depends on when the Server constructor is called to create a new server instance. This could be during server startup or when a new connection is established.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: Enabling keepalive on rpc/native connections can have a positive impact on the system by reducing connection setup time and improving overall connection reliability. However, it may also increase resource usage due to maintaining idle connections.
